Just a shame that every track has short, hard encoded fadeouts when this should be a gapless album; it's really disruptive to the flow of the music, especially because most tracks are only a minute or two long. Was this a result of ripping or is this how the CD sounds?

Anyway, thanks for posting this. A bad copy is better than no copy. :-/
